name: Pâté en croute
description: Pâté en croute is a traditional dish made with meat pâté that is gently wrapped in a pastry cover, then baked

name: Foie Gras
description: A specialty food product made of the liver of a duck or goose

name: Crêpes
description: A very thin type of pancake. Crêpes are usually one of two varieties: sweet crêpes or savoury galettes.
